content.rendered:
[vc_row the1_padding=”padding-small”][vc_column width=”5/12″]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-1″]

WE ARE MOMENTS MAKERS

Creative at heart, pioneering by nature.

Based in Ho Chi Minh City with over five years of proven experience, Pulse Active has pioneered the sports-tourism and lifestyle-entertainment events industry in Vietnam. We specialize in creating exciting platforms aimed at a wide range of people and places, ensuring that we are capable of crafting events purpose-built for anyone, anywhere.

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

History

Since our birth in 2013, we have flawlessly delivered numerous brand activations through events which seamlessly combine sport and entertainment. Along the way, we have created and maintained enduring relationships with governments, brands, agencies and media, both nationwide and across Southeast Asia.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

The mission

We strive to encourage people to engage in a more active, healthy lifestyle through meaningful, memorable experiences.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_padding=”padding-small” the1_colorpicker=”#f7f7f7″][vc_column]
OUR NUMBERS
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_padding=”padding-small”][vc_column]
  • Years of Experience
  • +Events Held
  • K+Participants
  • Cities
  • +International Artists
  • +Local Artists
  • +Brands we worked with
  • KViews on Youtube
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_colorpicker=”#515151″ css=”.vc_custom_1539002366672{margin-top: 1px !important;margin-bottom: 1px !important;border-top-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 1px !important;padding-bottom: 1px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;border-top-color: #dbdbdb !important;border-bottom-color: #dbdbdb !important;}”][vc_column]

In House

360º
Ecosystem

EVENT CONCEPT & MANAGEMENT

Understanding both our audience and industry is essential to establishing and developing successful events, but we do not stop here. We use our innovative creativity to build brand-new event experiences.

CREATIVITY & VISUAL

Experienced creativity and out-of-the-box thinking are central to everything we do.

MARKETING & COMMUNICATIONS

With interactive marketing as our core medium, along with event design, video production and brand identity, our campaigns aim to directly engage brands with participants.

OPERATIONS & PRODUCTION

At every step along the way from concept to reality, we guarantee top-notch event site production and logistics.

EVENT TECHNOLOGY

Our skills and equipment ensure that every step before, during and after an event is carried out efficiently and professionally.

LOYALTY PLATFORM

Customer loyalty is a crucial driver of growth and profitability. Therefore, we offer a unique, innovative and non-traditional loyalty platform for our valued partners.

BRAND ACTIVATION

We create unforgettable, unique brand experiences anywhere customers engage your Brand thereby securing brand partiality, loyalty, as well as an increase of sales.

CONSULTANCY

We consult our sponsors & partners to plan tailored strategies while aligning with business objectives through massive brand exposure and a great opportunity to engage with potential customers.

MERCHANDISE

With accumulated knowledge and sufficient experience in both process and technology, we provide our clients with exceptional merchandise products that can tell your brand's story,

REGISTRATION

We provide all of the online registration and ticketing tools to help you create your payment service.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Creating moments since 2013...

OUR
MILESTONES
[vc_column_text]
2013

PULSE ACTIVE ESTABLISHED

Bady Pham and Phillip Nguyen joined forces to encourage a more active & healthy lifestyle among Vietnamese.

A MARATHON WAS BROUGHT BACK TO HO CHI MINH CITY, NAMED AS HCMC RUN 

Our first city run was organized in Ho Chi Minh City, specifically in Phu My Hung. It targeted beginners and aimed to develop the local running community. Although only short distances were offered (3km, 5km & 10km), Chronotrack, a chip timing system, was brought to Vietnam for the first time.

 

2014

COLOR ME RUN WAS HELD FOR THE 1ST TIME EVER & AWARDED AS MOST TALKED EVENT BY BUZZMETRIC

A new running event  concept was brought to Vietnam, fusing music, colored powder & running.  It went on to become a phenomenon, a must-attend festival in Vietnam, especially among millennials. Kelly Rowland and Suboi were the

DANANG INTERNATIONAL MARATHON HOLD BY PULSE ACTIVE

Vietnam’s first international marathon at the time, it was also the first national race to be certified by AIMS and become a Boston Marathon Qualifier.

PRISMA – THE NIGHT RUN IS LAUNCHED

Our first night running event was held in Ho Chi Minh City, offering much more than a race, with artists performing on stage, along with stunning visuals, lights and sound effects.

 

2015

ZEDD – TRUE COLORS TOUR ARRIVES TO HCMC

Pulse Active steps  on the international artists tour license industry by bringing the well known electronic producer,  Zedd.

COLOR ME RUN EXPANDS TO 3 CITIES & LISTED AS 3 MOST INFLUENTIAL EVENTS IN VIETNAM BY WECHOICE

The event double its participation in HCMC and due to its high demand PA expands further to Hanoi and Danang. City.

HCMC RUN – 21KM ADDITION

After a first successful edition, the race is held again adding the half marathon distance.

CO-ORGANIZER OF BATTLE OF THE YEAR VIETNAM (BOTY)

Pulse Active organizes the battle of the year in Ho Chi Minh City

2016

PULSE BECOMES “CHALLENGE FAMILY TRIATHLON” LICENSE HOLDER FOR INDOCHINA & ORGANIZE 1ST CHALLENGE FAMILY TRIATHLON RACE IN VIETNAM

We joined the triathlon industry by cooperating with The Challenge Triathlon Family,  the global race series. The event was held in Nha Trang.

CHALLENGE VIETNAM WON THE BEST INAUGURAL LONG COURSE TRIATHLON IN ASIA BY ASIATRI

 

2017

HCMC RUN RENAMES TO HCMC MARATHON

Following a tradition from 1992, our run was renamed to the Ho Chi Minh City Marathon, and we added the full marathon distance (42km).

LE FRUIT TRIATHLON IS BACK WITH ITS 15TH EDITION

Created in 2002, Le Fruit Triathlon is the longest standing multi-sport event and the unique off-road triathlon organized in Vietnam. In 2017, Pulse Active worked together with the Le Fruit team in order to bring back the event, having a very successful race held in Vung Tau.

THE CHAINSMOKERS – MEMORIES…DO NOT OPEN TOUR HOLD IN HCMC

We brought the award-winning EDM duo to Vietnam, with HCMC acting as a destination on the Memories….Do Not Open Tour.

2018

COLOR ME RUN – 5 YEARS ANNIVERSARY

This event’s popularity continued to surge, attracting over 13,0000 participants. It is without a doubt the most popular paid mass scale event in Vietnam.

SPIA ASIA AWARDS MANULIFE DANANG INTERNATIONAL MARATHON & COLOR ME RUN FOR THE FOLLOWING ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS: 

  • Top 10 in the best international sport event of the year (bySPIA)
  • Manulife danang international marathon: top 10 in the best mass participation event of the year (by SPIA)
  • Color me run: top 10 in the best mass participation event of the year (by SPIA)

 

 

2019

HCMC MARATHON IS OFFICIALLY LISTED IN THE VIETNAM NATIONAL ATHLETICS CHAMPIONSHIP. 

HCMC MARATHON IS LISTED AS “THE HCMC NEW YEAR’S CELEBRATION” EVENTS AND BECOME THE TRADITIONAL EVENT OF HO CHI MINH CITY. 

PULSE ACTIVE IS AWARDED FOR THE IMPACT OF SPORTS DEVELOPMENT BY DANANG CITY. 

LOTTE DOWNTOWN DUTY-FREE PRE-OPENING CONCERT 2019 HOLD IN DANANG

Produced by Pulse Active, the concert was also the first concert of LOTTE Duty-Free and SM Entertainment in Vietnam opening a new era for K-Pop fans

PULSE ACTIVE IS AWARDED FOR CONTRIBUTING TO VIETNAM TOURISM IN NHA TRANG

Pulse Active was awarded for the contributions to this great milestone of Vietnam’s tourism and deeply honored to receive the Certificate of Merit from Khanh Hoa People’s Committee at the Closing ceremony.

 

 

 

2020

CHALLENGE VIETNAM WON THE BEST OVERALL RACE: LONG COURSE CATEGORY IN THE 2019 BEST RACES AWARDS BY ASIATRI.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_padding=”padding-small”][vc_column]

We are proud to have received continued recognition from the government, as well as private and public organizations. Our programs have been acknowledged numerous times for their economic impact and social contributions to the cities they are held in.

ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
